column5: I don't usually post steelhead reports but nailed a nice lake Erie piggy this morning and thought I would share .     Bad pic I hate fishing solo.
Thats an awsome fish and a pretty good solo pic!
You're killin' me man!   Don't you ever fish on weekends!    Good Work!
Just shoot me a text if ya want to head out on a weekend I Can usually get out for a early morning fish but its busy on the weekends.
I was expecting a deer rofl nice fish tho
LOL thats why I added the info of not the 4 legged kind so all the hunters don't get to excited
Nice bow SRT8 Beauty for sure Leechman
Wow! Beauty fish, well done! This weekend couldnt come faster.  TDunn
Thanks for all the comments guys can't wait till the big girls start coming in next big rain should loader up most females this year have been 4-5lbs but lots of fun I love this time of year.
Nice bud.  I hear ya on the rain. I let the powers to be know I could be a couple hrs late this morn if we got the rain we were supposed to......now I'm on the train.

nice big bow.  and that's actually a pretty good picture for solo... considering how steep the banks are, how big the fish is, and how long a float rod is to manage in the meantime.  i don't fish on weekends as much either.  i've never been one for crowds... even northern ontario "crowds"...
Beautiful steelhead...I'm waiting for one like that
